description: Create or update the metadata of an Iot hub. The usual pattern to modify a property is to retrieve the IoT hub metadata and security metadata, and then combine them with the modified values in a new body to update the IoT hub.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the IoT hub.

if_match.description: ETag of the IoT Hub. Do not specify for creating a brand new IoT Hub. Required to update an existing IoT Hub.

resource_name.description: The name of the IoT hub.

iot_hub_description.description: The IoT hub metadata and security metadata.
